block.p: Heather Jill Bogdanoff, the daughter of Dr. Carole R. Bogdanoff and Dr. Bruce M. Bogdanoff of Wallingford, Pa., is to be married today to Dr. Felix James Baker, a son of Dr. Therese L. Baker of Carlsbad, Calif., and Dr. Keith M. Baker of Stanford, Calif. Rabbi Stephen Grundfast is to officiate at the Park Hyatt at the Bellevue in Philadelphia.

The bride, 29, graduated from Northwestern University and is a doctoral candidate in clinical psychology at American University. Her father is a clinical associate professor of neurology at MCP/Hahnemann University in Philadelphia and is an attending neurologist at Crozer Chester Medical Center in Upland, Pa. Her mother is a clinical psychologist in Bryn Mawr, Pa.

Heather Jill Bogdanoff, the daughter of Dr. Carole R. Bogdanoff and Dr. Bruce M. Bogdanoff of Wallingford, Pa., is to be married today to Dr. Felix James Baker, a son of Dr. Therese L. Baker of Carlsbad, Calif., and Dr. Keith M. Baker of Stanford, Calif. Rabbi Stephen Grundfast is to officiate at the Park Hyatt at the Bellevue in Philadelphia.

The bride, 29, graduated from Northwestern University and is a doctoral candidate in clinical psychology at American University. Her father is a clinical associate professor of neurology at MCP/Hahnemann University in Philadelphia and is an attending neurologist at Crozer Chester Medical Center in Upland, Pa. Her mother is a clinical psychologist in Bryn Mawr, Pa.

The bridegroom, 31, is a managing partner in Baker/Tisch Investments, an independent biotechnology and pharmaceutical company fund in New York. He graduated from Stanford University, from which he also received a Ph.D. in immunology. His mother is a professor of sociology and the chairwoman of the sociology department at California State University at San Marcos. His father is a professor of French history and the dean of humanities at Stanford.
